A

angle - Variable in class MyObject
 

B

BuildMoons() - Method in class MyPlanet
This method when called upon a planet builds the moons of the planet, using a for loop and randomly generating the rotation speed of the moons as a value between 0 and 5, using the rand method and storing it in rotSpeed variable.

col - Variable in class MyObject

drawSolarObject(MyObject) - Method in class SolarSystem
Draws a round shape in the window at the given co-ordinates that represents an object in the solar system.
drawSolarObjectAbout(MyObject, MyObject) - Method in class SolarSystem
Draws a round shape in the window at the given co-ordinates.
drawSolarSystem() - Method in class MySolarSystem
This method runs the solar system by incrementing the angle in the polar coordinates of the solarObjects and redrawing them in an always true while loop.
Driver - Class in <Unnamed>
This class provides the runnable instance of the MySolarSystem class.

F

finishedDrawing() - Method in class SolarSystem
Updates the window to show all objects that have recently been drawn using drawSolarObject() or drawSolarObjectAbout().

MySolarSystem - Class in <Unnamed>
MySolarSystem class creates an instance of the SolarSystem class based on the model we want to build drawing this model by using the draw methods in the SolarSystem class.
MySolarSystem() - Constructor for class MySolarSystem
MySolarSystem constructor builds the solar system based on instance variables of this class.
MySun - Class in <Unnamed>
Subclass of myObject which represents the sun.
MySun(double, double, double, String) - Constructor for class MySun
MySun constructor, which takes in all the values used in MyObject but automatically puts sun in the center of the frame.
